text: (Kare wa) anata gata no tame ni daichi o fushido to shi, mata ozora o tengai to sa re, ten kara ame o furase, anata gata no tame ni kate to shite shuju no kajitsu o minora se rareru katadearu. Dakara anata gata wa (shinri o) shitta-jo wa,(yuiitsu naru) arra no soto ni onajiyona-shin ga aru nado to tonaete wa naranai
